attributes.action: I want have a re-run of the 1975 referendum on joining the EEC
attributes.background: If we have not voted to join the EEC in 1975, we would not have had a referendum in 2016 and the current betrayal of the UK elxtorate would not be happening

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The EEC became the EC and then the EU, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
